p.s: The excerpt of the novel The Great Gatsby, written by F. Scott Fitzgerald and published in 1925, deals with the visit of Daisy and how Daisy and Gatsby act around eachothereach other after the long time they haven't seen them.
In the beginning of the scenen Daisy arrives at Nick's house with the thought that it is gonna be a meeting with just her and Nick, but Gatsby is in the house, too.
Daisy and Gatsby know eachothereach other from the past but they haven't met a long time.
First, they act really distant and Gatsby wants Nick to stay with them because he is really nervous.
Nick feels uncomfortable and leaves the house for a certain time.
When he comes back, the atmosphere seems to change and they are not that distant anymore.
Daisy also looks like she has cried but they both act happier.
